thought: To craft polished_andesite_stairs, I need to first craft 3 polished_andesite blocks. Each polished_andesite requires 1 andesite, so I need to move 3 andesite blocks to the crafting grid. I will move the first andesite block to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
